title: Hour 2 - Joe Vardon (07-14-20)
itunes:title: Hour 2 - Joe Vardon (07-14-20)
description:
Joe Vardon covers the Lakers and says he is 100 percent confident that the NBA season will start on time. Joe tells Dan about his life in Florida living in quarantine. He says that he gets his food delivered and that he cannot go down the hall

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
